args:
Determine whether this social media post from Donald Trump contains a personal insult to Kamala Harris's intelligence. Simply return "yes" or "no".
content: RT @TeamTrumpTrump Senior Adviser @JasonMillerinDC: "I am ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTED that Kamala Harris and Joe Biden can laugh about this or completely ignore it. You heard from President Trump today that if there was another country that was making threats or a potential assassination attempt on a leader... he would take immediate action. He would send a signal that they would be blown to smithereens... this is an attack on the entire United States."
